```{r setup, include=FALSE}

                      warning = FALSE,
                      message = FALSE)
library(vitae)
library(here)
```


# Education

```{r EDUCATION}
read.csv(here("data", "education.csv")) |>
  detailed_entries(
    with = degree,
    what = institution,
    why = detail,
    when = glue::glue("{startMonth} {startYear} --> {endMonth} {endYear}",.na = ""),
    where = location
  )
```

# Research

```{r}
research <- read.csv(here("data", "research.csv"))
```

## Working Papers

```{r}
research |>
  filter(type == "working_paper") |>
  detailed_entries(
    with = title,
    what = coauthors,
    why = detail,
    where = date
  )
```

## Work in Progress

```{r}
research |>
  filter(type == "work_in_progress") |>
  detailed_entries(
    with = title,
    what = coauthors,
    why = detail
  )
```
